div.h2: Discover the tracks we are making.

div.p: Ben Van Schaick & Annika Christensen won the honors of advancing to the Regional Spelling Bee, which will be held on February 8th at Northland Community and Technical College.

a.title: Go to comments for Spelling Bee Champs

div.p: LHS Seniors took part in College Application Day. We had eight college admissions representatives and several staff members on hand to help over 100 student fill out 236 application for schools around the midwest!

a.title: Go to comments for College App Day!

div.p: Thirty-five new members were inducted into the Lincoln High School chapter of the National Honor Society on Thursday, November 9.

a.title: Go to comments for National Honor Society

Go to comments for Ozobots at CES

div.p: ProDigi Team 3277 placed 3rd of 63 teams at the Lake Superior Regional FIRST Robotics Competition. The team, in partnership with advisors from DigiKey, earned the Excellence in Engineering Award based on the design and performance of their bot. #prowlerproud

a.title: Go to comments for Pro Digi Team 3277
